statements: SELECT * FROM QuantumHardwareData WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT hardware_name, quantum_bits FROM QuantumHardwareData WHERE quantum_bits > 10;
SELECT id, hardware_name, last_updated FROM QuantumHardwareData ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT * FROM QuantumHardwareData WHERE quantum_bits BETWEEN 5 AND 10;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM QuantumHardwareData;
SELECT * FROM QuantumHardwareData WHERE quantum_bits > 10 ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT hardware_name, quantum_bits FROM QuantumHardwareData WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY quantum_bits ASC;
SELECT id, hardware_name FROM QuantumHardwareData WHERE last_updated >= '2021-01-01' AND last_updated <= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY id;
SELECT COUNT(id) AS total_hardware FROM QuantumHardwareData GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_hardware > 1;
SELECT hardware_name, quantum_bits FROM QuantumHardwareData WHERE hardware_name LIKE '%Quantum%' ORDER BY hardware_name ASC, quantum_bits DESC;
SELECT * FROM QuantumDevices;
SELECT device_name, user_id FROM QuantumDevices WHERE device_id = 10;
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM QuantumDevices ORDER BY device_id DESC;
SELECT measurement_id, device_id, measurement_value FROM QuantumMeasurements WHERE measurement_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT device_id, user_id FROM QuantumDevices JOIN QuantumMeasurements ON QuantumDevices.device_id = QuantumMeasurements.device_id;
SELECT * FROM QuantumDevices
SELECT device_name, user_id, last_updated FROM QuantumDevices
SELECT device_id, device_name, user_id, last_updated FROM QuantumDevices ORDER BY device_id DESC
SELECT device_name, user_id, last_updated FROM QuantumDevices WHERE user_id = 123
SELECT * FROM QuantumMeasurements WHERE measurement_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY measurement_value DESC
SELECT * FROM quantum_hardware_data;
SELECT device_name, quantum_bits FROM quantum_hardware_data ORDER BY quantum_bits DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, device_name, quantum_bits FROM quantum_hardware_data WHERE quantum_bits >= 50 ORDER BY user_id;
SELECT update_description, timestamp FROM updates ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM quantum_hardware_data WHERE quantum_bits > 10
SELECT u.username, u.role, q.device_name FROM users u JOIN quantum_hardware_data q ON u.user_id = q.user_id
SELECT q.device_name, q.quantum_bits, u.username FROM quantum_hardware_data q LEFT JOIN users u ON q.user_id = u.user_id
SELECT q.device_name, COUNT(u.user_id) AS total_users FROM quantum_hardware_data q LEFT JOIN users u ON q.user_id = u.user_id GROUP BY q.device_name
SELECT u.username, u.email, u.role, COUNT(q.device_name) AS total_devices FROM users u JOIN quantum_hardware_data q ON u.user_id = q.user_id GROUP BY u.username, u.email, u.role
SELECT * FROM quantum_hardware;
SELECT hardware_name, owner_id, last_updated FROM quantum_hardware ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT h.hardware_name, u.username FROM quantum_hardware h JOIN users u ON h.owner_id = u.id;
SELECT * FROM quantum_hardware WHERE owner_id = 1;
SELECT h.hardware_name, l.action FROM quantum_hardware h JOIN hardware_logs l ON h.id = l.hardware_id;
SELECT * FROM quantum_hardware WHERE owner_id = 1;
SELECT hardware_name, owner_id, last_updated FROM quantum_hardware WHERE owner_id = 2 ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT hardware_name, owner_id, timestamp FROM quantum_hardware INNER JOIN hardware_logs ON quantum_hardware.id = hardware_logs.hardware_id;

SELECT users.username, quantum_hardware.hardware_name, hardware_logs.action FROM users INNER JOIN user_access ON users.id = user_access.user_id INNER JOIN quantum_hardware ON user_access.hardware_id = quantum_hardware.id INNER JOIN hardware_logs ON quantum_hardware.id = hardware_logs.hardware_id;

SELECT quantum_hardware.hardware_name, COUNT(hardware_logs.log_id) AS log_count FROM quantum_hardware LEFT JOIN hardware_logs ON quantum_hardware.id = hardware_logs.hardware_id GROUP BY quantum_hardware.hardware_name HAVING log_count > 5 ORDER BY log_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM quantum_hardware;
SELECT name, location FROM quantum_hardware WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT experiment_id, start_time, end_time FROM experiments WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM quantum_hardware WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, location FROM quantum_hardware WHERE name LIKE '%quantum%';
SELECT e.experiment_id, u.username, q.name FROM experiments e JOIN users u ON e.user_id = u.user_id JOIN quantum_hardware q ON e.hardware_id = q.id;
SELECT u.username, e.start_time, e.end_time FROM experiments e JOIN users u ON e.user_id = u.user_id WHERE e.start_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-01';
SELECT ed.data_name, ed.data_value FROM experiment_data ed JOIN experiments e ON ed.experiment_id = e.experiment_id WHERE e.user_id = 5;
